title: Organization Settings
description: Manage your organization settings and preferences

dangerZone.deleteDescription: Mark this organization for deletion. This action can be reversed by restoring the organization.
dangerZone.restoreDescription: Restore this organization and make it active again.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Organization Deletion
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this organization? This will mark it for deletion and restrict access. You can restore it later if needed.

restoreDialog.title: Confirm Organization Restoration
restoreDialog.message: Are you sure you want to restore this organization? This will make it active again and restore full access.

deleteSuccess.title: Organization Deleted
deleteSuccess.message: The organization has been successfully marked for deletion

deleteError.title: Delete Failed
deleteError.message: Failed to delete the organization. Please try again.

restoreSuccess.title: Organization Restored
restoreSuccess.message: The organization has been successfully restored

restoreError.title: Restore Failed
restoreError.message: Failed to restore the organization. Please try again.
